summary: This document is a deposit account resolution for Blue Chip Capital LLC at Fifth Third Bank. It outlines the authority granted to the bank to accept deposits and manage accounts for the company, including the authorization of specific individuals to execute transactions on behalf of the company.
keyFacts: The document establishes Fifth Third Bank as a depository for Blue Chip Capital LLC.
It authorizes specific individuals to manage and execute transactions for the company.
The resolution includes provisions for wire transfers and other banking services.
Facsimile signatures are accepted as valid signatures for transactions.
The document emphasizes the need for prompt notification to the bank regarding any changes in ownership or business structure.
